mapper.select: select xuatchieu.ngay,ngaychieu.giobatdau from xuatchieu join ngaychieu on ngaychieu.stt = xuatchieu.stt where xuatchieu.maphim = #{maPhim} and ngaychieu.ngay = cast (#{Ngay} as date)

select ngaychieu.stt ,ngaychieu.giobatdau, xuatchieu.stt as stt_xc from chinhanh join phongchieu on phongchieu.macn = chinhanh.macn join xuatchieu on xuatchieu.maphong = phongchieu.maphong join ngaychieu on ngaychieu.stt = xuatchieu.ngay join phim on phim.maphim = xuatchieu.maphim where chinhanh.macn = #{maCN} and phim.maphim = #{maPhim} and ngaychieu.ngay = CURRENT_DATE order by ngaychieu.giobatdau
select * from SelectStt(cast (#{ngay} as date),cast (#{gioBatDau} as time))
